  • Field Details

    • path

      public final Point[] path
      The absolute points that the robot will follow which make up the path.

      The Localizer that this path follower is using to determine its position.

  • Constructor Details

    • PurePursuitPathFollower

      public PurePursuitPathFollower(Point[] path, Localizer<Pose> localizer, double lookaheadDistance, double speed)
      Creates a path follower to follow the path specified in path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path that the robot will follow.
      localizer - The localizer the robot will use to determine its position on the field.
      lookaheadDistance - The distance, in inches, the robot will aim towards on the path.
      speed - The speed the robot will attempt to follow the path at.

  • Method Details

    • follow

      public boolean follow(MecanumDriver mecanumDriver) throws IllegalStateException
      This method makes the follow the path. It must be called as frequently as possible when following the path.
      Parameters:
      mecanumDriver - The driver controller.
      Returns:
      True if the path has been fully followed, false if following is still in progress.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException

    • getLookaheadPoint

      public Point getLookaheadPoint(Point point, double r)
      Taken from here, and adapted to work with T-10's codebase. Generates the furthest lookahead point on the path that is distance r from the point (x, y).
      Parameters:
      point - The point of the origin of the circle. This should be the absolute position of the robot.
      r - The lookahead distance.
      Returns:
      A double[] coordinate pair if the lookahead point exists, or null.
      See Also:
      • Circle-Line Intersection
